item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“butterscaperules, post:39, topic:272891”]a 508 cant have a dragon plate or d claws[/quote][quote=“Denoria, post:40, topic:272891”]508 Servers do not even have that…it’s 523, 525.
Virus Scan? Proves nothing…it can have all sorts of java exploits.[/quote]

Just shows how far this community is going… Custom items on 508’s were released ages ago…Same with custom sprites

Here’s an example from one of Dragonkings tuts on r-s

It scans as one file.
